Uses of Class
com.datastax.driver.core.TupleValue

  • Packages that use TupleValue 
    Package Description
    com.datastax.driver.core
    The main package for the DataStax Java driver for Cassandra.

      Returns a new empty value for this tuple type.
      TupleValue TupleType.newValue(Object... values)
      Returns a new value for this tuple type that uses the provided values for the components.
